entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
